values: The Fatal Disobedience of Adam and the Triumphant Obedience of ChristThe Fatal Disobedience of Adam and the Triumphant Obedience of Christ

We are sinful by nature because of our father, Adam, but we can claim the righteousness of our Savior, Jesus.We are sinful by nature because of our father, Adam, but we can claim the righteousness of our Savior, Jesus.
